about_the_game:
About This Game:

The game begins with a tragic tale of a scientist whose reckless experiments led to the destruction of the world, plunging it into chaos and pollution. The protagonist, Lin, loses everything he holds dear—his family and his beloved—in the aftermath. Consumed by grief and rage, Lin embarks on a journey of revenge. However, after a climactic battle with the scientist, Lin is defeated and left for dead. Just as all hope seems lost, a mysterious hero intervenes, saving Lin and transporting him to a parallel world.

In this surreal and otherworldly realm, Lin must complete four unique stages to collect Gate Tokens, which are essential for repairing the portal back to his world. Once the portal is restored, Lin returns to his original world with newfound powers, ready to continue his quest for vengeance.

Game Features:

1. Supernatural Abilities:

  • Unlock and upgrade unique powers to enhance combat and exploration. As you progress, you’ll gain access to devastating abilities that change the way you approach battles and challenges.

2. Dynamic Fight Scenes:

  • Engage in fully interactive battles with complete freedom of movement. Every encounter is designed to be strategic and immersive, allowing you to adapt your tactics on the fly.

3. Integrated Level Design Engine:

  • Unleash your creativity with a built-in level design tool. Create custom levels, add your own images and music, and even program new gameplay mechanics. The possibilities are endless!

4. Discord Bot Integration:

  • Share your custom-designed levels directly through a Discord server. Levels uploaded to the server will automatically appear in the game, allowing other players to download and play them seamlessly.

5. Side Missions:

  • Take on additional tasks that offer unique rewards and expand the overall experience. These missions provide deeper insights into the game’s world and characters.

6. Character Customization:

  • Unlock and change skins for your character, and add special upgrades as you progress. Personalize Lin to suit your playstyle and aesthetic preferences.

Full Version Features:

The full version of the game includes:

  • All four stages of the parallel world, each with unique challenges and environments.

  • Additional supernatural abilities to unlock and master.

  • More side missions and character customization options.

  • Enhanced level design tools, including advanced programming options for creating complex gameplay mechanics.

  • Full Discord integration, enabling a thriving community of level creators and players.

Why This Game Stands Out:

This game combines intense action, emotional storytelling, and unprecedented creative freedom. With its innovative level design engine and Discord integration, it offers a unique experience that bridges the gap between players and creators. Whether you’re here for the story, the combat, or the creativity, this game has something for everyone.

Join the Journey:

Embark on Lin’s quest for vengeance, explore a surreal parallel world, and unleash your creativity with the level design engine. The adventure awaits—dive into the full version and experience everything this game has to offer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Amd hd5450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Note: If your device is powerful, make ULTRA
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: i3 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Note: If your device is powerful, make ULTRA

short_description: Embark on a perilous journey through a shattered world. Battle relentless enemies, conquer powerful bosses, and uncover ancient secrets. With deadly traps and supernatural powers, survival is your only goal. Will you rise as the hero or fall to the chaos?
